channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sequoia partner spreads debunked Brown shooting theory, testing new leadership
item.description: The newest episode raises questions about whether Sequoia's new leadership -- managing partners Alfred Lin and Pat Grady, who took over last month -- ...

item.title: Ex-Splunk execs’ startup Resolve AI hits $1 billion valuation with Series A
item.description: The round was led by Lightspeed Venture Partners, according to people familiar with the deal.

item.title: Former Patagonia CEO Rose Marcario resigns from Rivian’s board
item.description: Marcario joined the board in 2021, and will maintain her position as chair overseeing the Rivian Foundation, which made its first grants last year.

item.title: Hundreds of Cisco customers are vulnerable to new Chinese hacking campaign, researchers say
item.description: Cisco warned that Chinese government hackers are exploiting a zero-day in some of its products. Researchers now say there are hundreds of vulnerable C...

item.title: Building venture-backable companies in heavily regulated spaces
item.description: This week on Build Mode, Startup Battlefield editor Isabelle Johannessen spoke to two founders who are working to make progress in industries ripe for...

item.title: Rocket Lab wins another defense-related space contract
item.description: The $816 million contract follows a separate $515 million — both awarded by the U.S. Space Development Agency.

item.title: Yann LeCun confirms his new ‘world model’ startup, reportedly seeks $5B+ valuation
item.description: Renowned AI scientist Yann LeCun confirmed on Thursday the worst-kept secret in the tech world: that he had indeed launched a new startup. Although he...

item.title: Scammers in China Are Using AI-Generated Images to Get Refunds
item.description: From dead crabs to shredded bed sheets, fraudsters are using fake photos and videos to get their money back from ecommerce sites.

item.title: Anonymous messaging app NGL was acquired by ‘EarnPhone’ startup Mode Mobile
item.description: Given NGL's track record of dubious growth hacking, this partnership with Mode Mobile seems like a good match.

item.title: Sam Altman’s New Brain Venture, Merge Labs, Will Spin Out of a Nonprofit
item.description: Merge Labs, a brain-computer interface startup that seeks to read brain activity using ultrasound, is being spun out of Forest Neurotech, a Los Angele...
